speaker: Breitbart
vclaim: "Institutionalized media" ignored President Donald Trump's July 4th event.
date: stated on July 5, 2019 in a post on Facebook:
title: No, "Institutionalized Media" didn't ignore President Trump's Fourth of July celebration.
text: On Facebook, Britt wrote that the left was rooted against President Donald Trump, "Peace on America." "The media factory ignored it," still published July 5th, "but people showed up anyway and it was an explosion!" Words: "Happy Birthday, America! "Love, we the people," appears in the red type on the picture. The commentators expressed support for this article, including those who said: "Can you believe that the weak media deliberately tried to hide this beautiful celebration from the American people? If you have not seen it before, you certainly see it now; they are the enemies of the people." The article was referred to as part of Facebook efforts to combat false news and misleading information in its news broadcast. ∙ (Read more about our partnership with Facebook.) Britt did not respond immediately to a letter from the Poletti Fact newspaper asking about the article. On July 10, the eagle reported 6.4 million people watching the celebrations on television. Most of these were caught in Fox News, which had 4.9 million viewers during the hour, according to Nelson's estimates. The CNN coverage of the Trump speech was mixed with analysis and attracted 1.5 million viewers, according to the eagle. According to Newsweek, CBS, C-SPAN and Fox News news will be broadcast live and broadcast elsewhere on the Internet.
